title: temp email
description: A fast and private temporary email service
card_description: This is your temporary email, the email list refreshes every 10 seconds

custom_email.label: Custom address
custom_email.hint: Leave blank to get a random address.
custom_email.error_taken: This address is already taken. Please choose another.
custom_email.error_invalid: Only 3-32 letters, numbers, dots, underscores, or dashes.

features.title: Open-source
features.description: Our code is open-source, you can view it on GitHub.

features.title: Free
features.description: Our service is always free. No payment, no subscription.

features.title: Simple
features.description: Just one click, you can get a temporary email.

features.title: Self-hosted
features.description: You can deploy a TempEmail service by yourself, just a few minutes.
